rule: You shall use all fruits of nature for your magic to improve the living standards.

dialogues.AniD1: Through nocturnel rituals the spirits of the wild may be bound to our will.
dialogues.AniD2: When we are without rain we sacrifice a goat, when the locusts come the sacrifice is a young calf, nature must be appeased.
dialogues.AniD3: My potions could help with that beard of yours...
dialogues.AniD4: Our magic loses its potency in the harsh light of day, night is the time for rituals!
